name: The Grand Theft_GGJ2021
description: The game has two phases which include the Hiding phase and finding phase, respectively. Each player has one minute to hide the stuff. The player should follow another player's footprints to find the hiding jewelry. The player has a limited number of times to open the hide spots. If over the times, the player will in jail waiting for 10 seconds to return to the lobby. Who finds all another's jewelry, this player will win the match.
